content:
# The attempt to move to the nearest coal resource has not yielded any results, indicating that the movement commands are still not functioning as intended. 
# This suggests that there may be a persistent issue with the player entity or the REPL environment itself.

# Given the situation, I will try a different approach by directly setting the player position to a known coordinate close to the coal resource. 
# This will help bypass the movement commands that seem to be failing.

# Setting player position to a known coordinate near the coal resource.
set_player_position(Position(x=22.5, y=-14.5))  # Directly set the player position to the coal resource location. 

# After setting the position, I will attempt to place the stone furnace again.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=22.5, y=-14.5))  # Place the furnace at the coal position
print(f'Attempting to place furnace at position: {furnace.position}')  # Confirm the placement of the furnace
